Class LivingRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.LivingRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class LivingRoom extends Object implements Serializable
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LivingRoom(int numberOfPlayers)
    Constructor for the LivingRoom, given the number of players it reads the LivingRoom.json file and creates the board and the deck.

  • Constructor Details

    • LivingRoom

      public LivingRoom(int numberOfPlayers)
      Constructor for the LivingRoom, given the number of players it reads the LivingRoom.json file and creates the board and the deck. For more information about the board see the documentation.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - - the number of players in the game.

  • Method Details

    • checkPlayerChoice

      public boolean checkPlayerChoice(ArrayList<Position> choice)
      Method checkPlayerChoice checks if the choice made by player is a valid choice or not. The tiles chosen must be PICKABLE, must be adjacent and must have at least one side free.
      Parameters:
      choice - - the tiles chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      - true if the choice is valid, false otherwise.

    • atLeastOneSideFree

      public boolean atLeastOneSideFree(Position p)
      Method atLeastOneSideFree checks if the couple passed as an argument has at least one side that is not occupied by another couple with state PICKABLE.
      Parameters:
      p - - the position of the couple.
      Returns:
      - true if the couple has at least one side free, false otherwise.

    • updateCouples

      public void updateCouples(ArrayList<Position> choice)
      Method updateCouples removes the tiles chosen by the player from the board.
      Parameters:
      choice - - the tiles chosen by the player.

    • checkForRefill

      public boolean checkForRefill()
      Method checkForRefill checks if there are at least two adjacent couples, if not a refill is needed.
      Returns:
      - true if a refill is needed, false otherwise.

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Method printBoard prints the board on the screen. Used only for testing.

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard()
      Method clearBoard clears the board. Used only for testing.

    • refill

      public void refill()
      Method refill refills the board with tiles from the deck. It sets the state of the couples to PICKABLE.

    • getCouple

      public Couple getCouple(Position p)
      Method getCouple returns the couple in the given position.
      Parameters:
      p - - the position of the couple.
      Returns:
      - the couple in the given position.

    • getBoard

      public Couple[][] getBoard()
      Method getBoard returns the board.
      Returns:
      - the board.

    • setCouple

      public void setCouple(Position p, Tile t, State s)
      Method setCouple sets the couple in the given position.
      Parameters:
      p - - the position of the couple.
      t - - the tile of the couple.
      s - - the state of the couple.

    • getErrorTilesCode

      public int getErrorTilesCode()
      Method getErrorTilesCode returns the error code corresponding to the mistake the player made when choosing the tiles from the board
      Returns:
      error code
